title: Sausage and Kale Soup

ingredients: 2 small sweet potatoes, peeled and diced
1 (15 ounce) can garbanzos, drained and rinsed

steps: Heat oil in a deep pot over medium high heat.
Add sausage, potatoes and onions, cover and cook 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add garlic, bay leaves, and kale to the pot.  Cover pot and wilt greens 2 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper. Add beans, tomatoes, and broth to the pot and bring soup to a full boil.  Reduce heat back to medium and cook 5 to 10 minutes longer or until potatoes are tender.
Serve soup with hunks of crusty bread and butter
